# Aidan Parkhurst Magic Website - Svelte + Vite

## Project Overview
A personal website for close-up magician Aidan Parkhurst built with Svelte and Vite. Mobile-first responsive design with navigation, booking functionality, and media showcase.

## Technology Stack
- Svelte
- Vite
- Svelte Routing (svelte-spa-router)

## Design Specifications
- Background: RGB(240, 240, 240)
- Font (name): Javanese Text (serif)
- Font (body): Times New Roman
- Text color: Desaturated dark blue
- Mobile-first responsive design
